message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll give you 40, you can have 60. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you 45, you can have 55. It's a fair offer!
You're getting desperate, take 30 or walk away!
I'll give you 48, you can have 52. It's getting close to fair!
You're running out of time, take 20 or lose everything!
I'll give you 49, you can have 51. It's my final offer!
